sub_title: Manager Change Management & Culture at PwC Nederland
summary:
Cultural Change Manager with over 10 years of experience in a range of multinational organizations. 
Bachelor in Business Administration, certified  Ontological Coach and certified Change Mananger.

Specialties and expertise include change management, managing cultural change, organizational climate, organizational impact analysis, team development, developing and facilitating training programs & workshops, stakeholder management, communications, behavioural change and coaching.

Other passions: interior design, travelling, biking and personal image consulting.
